description: ATLANTA (AP) � Andrew Gutman's first goal of the season came in the fourth minute of second-half stoppage time, sending Atlanta United to a 2-1 victory over the Seattle Sounders on Saturday. Ronaldo Cisneros scored in the 23rd minute � his team-leading seventh of the season � to give Atlanta United (8-9-7) a 1-0 lead.
title: Gutman's late goal lifts Atlanta United over Sounders 2-1
title_page: Gutman's late goal lifts Atlanta United over Sounders 2-1 | AP News
maintext:
ATLANTA (AP) � Andrew Gutman�s first goal of the season came in the fourth minute of second-half stoppage time, sending Atlanta United to a 2-1 victory over the Seattle Sounders on Saturday.
Ronaldo Cisneros scored in the 23rd minute � his team-leading seventh of the season � to give Atlanta United (8-9-7) a 1-0 lead.
Cristian Roldan scored his fourth goal to pull Seattle (10-13-2) even in the 68th minute.
Marcelino Moreno notched an assist on Gutman�s match-winner.
The Sounders took four more shots, but Atlanta United had a 5-4 edge in shots on goal.
Stefan Frei saved three shots for Seattle. Rocco R�os Novo had three saves for Atlanta.
